wishes.text: Wish this Dussehra bring devotion, determination and dedication in your life. Shubh Dussehra!
May this Dussehra burn all your worries with Ravana and bring you and your family loads of happiness.
The time for the celebration of the victory of the good over the evil has arrived. Let's continue the same spirit. Happy Dusshera!
Enjoy the victory of good over the evil. May you have a fun-filled and blissful Dusshera.
May God shower his choicest wishes over you and remove all evil obstacles in life. Happy Dusshera.
Happy Dussehra to all of you. Hope this festive season brings lots of joy to you and your family.
May Lord Rama keep lighting your path of success and may you achieve victory in every phase of life. Jay Shree Ram. Happy Dusshera!
On this auspicious and pious occasion, I pray to Lord Rama to bless you with honor, dignity, and success. Happy Dusshera!
May Truth always win and good triumph over evil. May Lord always bless you with wisdom. Happy Vijaydashmi.
May this Dusshera all worries, problems and obstacles in the path of success get burned with the effigy of Ravana. Have a happy and blessed Dusshera.
May the demon in you always get defeated and the angel in you always control your thoughts. Have a blessed Vijaydashmi!
Happy Dussehra to all. May Shri Ram bless you and your family. A Happy, joyful and prosperous Dussehra to you and your family!
